NewsItem.HEADLINE: 5G Ultra Reliable Low Latency Communications IoT Annual Report 2018
NewsItem.SUMMARY: A strategic view of low latency, high reliability applications and the size of the market.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The ten-year forecast through 2029 provides a breakdown of 5G URLLC device shipments, base station support, and service revenues related to industrial and VR/AR applications. The forecast includes a view of operator deployment and enterprise deployments, with clear analysis of the barriers to market growth and the driving factors and applications that will push the market forward.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: URLLC 5G IoT ms low latency five 9s reliability
NewsItem.ATTACHMENT: MEXP-URLLC-18 rev0 ericsson.pdf, MEXP-URLLC-18 rev0 ericsson.xlsx,
